languages.text: "Безумие — сохранять ментальную ригидность в меняющихся условиях. Этот мир важен для Империума, для нашей борьбы с врагами Человечества. Погибнуть вместе с ним было бы верхом расточительности".

"Insanity is maintaining mental rigidity in fluctuating circumstances. This world is important for the Imperium and for our struggle against the enemies of Humanity. To perish along with this world would be the height of wastefulness."
languages.original_text: "Безумие — сохранять ментальную ригидность в меняющихся условиях. Этот мир важен для Империума, для нашей борьбы с врагами Человечества. Погибнуть вместе с ним было бы верхом расточительности".

traits.locale_text: "Insanity is maintaining mental rigidity in fluctuating circumstances. This world is important for the Imperium and for our struggle against the enemies of Humanity. To perish along with this world would be the height of wastefulness."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: “如果在不断变化的环境之中继续泥古不化，这才是真的疯了。这个世界是对抗人类之敌的前线，对帝国非常重要。若是与这个世界一起消亡，那恐怕才是最大的浪费。”
languages.original_text: "Insanity is maintaining mental rigidity in fluctuating circumstances. This world is important for the Imperium and for our struggle against the enemies of Humanity. To perish along with this world would be the height of wastefulness."

traits.locale_text: “如果在不断变化的环境之中继续泥古不化，这才是真的疯了。这个世界是对抗人类之敌的前线，对帝国非常重要。若是与这个世界一起消亡，那恐怕才是最大的浪费。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «Lo que es una locura es conservar esa rigidez por más que cambien las circunstancias. Este mundo es importante para el Imperium y nuestra contienda contra los enemigos de la Humanidad. Morir junto con este mundo sería un tremendo desperdicio».
languages.original_text: "Insanity is maintaining mental rigidity in fluctuating circumstances. This world is important for the Imperium and for our struggle against the enemies of Humanity. To perish along with this world would be the height of wastefulness."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que es una locura es conservar esa rigidez por más que cambien las circunstancias. Este mundo es importante para el Imperium y nuestra contienda contra los enemigos de la Humanidad. Morir junto con este mundo sería un tremendo desperdicio».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「狂気とは、変動する状況の中で精神的な硬直を維持することだ。この惑星は帝国にとって、そして人類の敵との戦いにとって重要だ。この惑星とともに滅びるのは無駄の極みだ」
languages.original_text: "Insanity is maintaining mental rigidity in fluctuating circumstances. This world is important for the Imperium and for our struggle against the enemies of Humanity. To perish along with this world would be the height of wastefulness."

traits.locale_text: 「狂気とは、変動する状況の中で精神的な硬直を維持することだ。この惑星は帝国にとって、そして人類の敵との戦いにとって重要だ。この惑星とともに滅びるのは無駄の極みだ」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « Conserver une mentalité rigide dans des circonstances changeantes serait de la folie. Ce monde revêt de l'importance pour l'Imperium et dans notre lutte contre les ennemis de l'humanité. Périr avec lui serait le comble du gâchis. »
languages.original_text: "Insanity is maintaining mental rigidity in fluctuating circumstances. This world is important for the Imperium and for our struggle against the enemies of Humanity. To perish along with this world would be the height of wastefulness."

traits.locale_text: « Conserver une mentalité rigide dans des circonstances changeantes serait de la folie. Ce monde revêt de l'importance pour l'Imperium et dans notre lutte contre les ennemis de l'humanité. Périr avec lui serait le comble du gâchis. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Wahnsinn bedeutet, mentale Festigkeit in sich verändernden Umständen zu bewahren. Diese Welt ist wichtig für das Imperium und für unseren Kampf gegen die Feinde der Menschheit. Zusammen mit dieser Welt unterzugehen, wäre der Gipfel der Verschwendung."
languages.original_text: "Insanity is maintaining mental rigidity in fluctuating circumstances. This world is important for the Imperium and for our struggle against the enemies of Humanity. To perish along with this world would be the height of wastefulness."

traits.locale_text: "Wahnsinn bedeutet, mentale Festigkeit in sich verändernden Umständen zu bewahren. Diese Welt ist wichtig für das Imperium und für unseren Kampf gegen die Feinde der Menschheit. Zusammen mit dieser Welt unterzugehen, wäre der Gipfel der Verschwendung."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Delilik, değişken şartlar altında zihinsel sağlamlığı korumaktır. Bu dünya, hem İmparatorluk hem de İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı verdiğimiz mücadele için önemli. Bu dünyayla birlikte yok olmak, muazzam bir müsriflik olur."
languages.original_text: "Insanity is maintaining mental rigidity in fluctuating circumstances. This world is important for the Imperium and for our struggle against the enemies of Humanity. To perish along with this world would be the height of wastefulness."

traits.locale_text: "Delilik, değişken şartlar altında zihinsel katılığı korumaktır. Bu dünya, İmparatorluk için ve İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı verdiğimiz mücadele için önemli. Bu dünyayla birlikte yok olmak, muazzam bir müsriflik olur."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
